name: @samlam140330/bulma-switch
description: Display classic checkbox as a switch button, in different colors, sizes, and states using Bulma framework. This is a fork version with some additional features and bug fixes of the original repository since it has been marked as an archive.
author: SamLam140330

scripts.mkdir: if not exist dist\sass mkdir dist\sass
scripts.build: gulp compileSass && npm run mkdir && npm run copy
